snippet: One class shy of her bachelor’s degree, Manpriya Samra suddenly had thousands of dollars in medical bills after an emergency appendectomy.
abstract: Community Health Advocates, state-designated health insurance consumer assistance program and unit of Community Service Society, helps college student Manpriya Samra of Brooklyn to afford health insurance and settle emergency hospital bills that threatened her future.
lead_paragraph: One class shy of her bachelor’s degree, Manpriya Samra suddenly had thousands of dollars in medical bills after an emergency appendectomy.

headline.print_headline: Close to College Degree, Then Medical Bills Came
headline.main: A College Degree Within Reach, Then Came the Medical Bills
